articles.title: Amazon's 'Lost Ark' is thriving because it's so hard to put down - The Washington Post
articles.description: Unlike Amazon’s other original titles, “Crucible” and “New World,” which had to find new audiences, “Lost Ark” has one built in within some pockets of the Asian diaspora.

articles.title: EDP Renewables to invest up to S$10 billion by 2030 for clean energy hub in Singapore - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: EDP Renewables (EDPR), the world's fourth-largest renewable energy producer, said on Thursday (Feb 24) it plans to invest up to S$10 billion by 2030 to establish a clean energy hub in Singapore for the Asia Pacific region.

articles.title: Asia markets fall as Russia attacks Ukraine; oil and gold prices pop - CNBC
